title: Superunknown: Of Fairytales and Grunge
description: If you received the penultimate comprehension and knowledge of the reason for being... what then?Reaching our dreams, the pinnacle of human aspirations. Go to school, grow up, work and die. Fairytales. Grunge.Em hopes her life will turn out like a fairytale, but worries that it will be as pointless as grunge music warns. Moving to a seaside town during the 1990's, at a new high school she meets Eido, a boy that appears to have what she seeks the most.SUPERUNKNOWN is a novella following the philosophy of absurdism, from an author who loves telling tales combining both philosophy and adventure. Tackling deep questions dear to readers of all ages, it is a tale of the human search for meaning, and of someone who might know an answer...
author: G.C. Huxley
